overview: Wow, things got a little crazy there for a while. After all the media attention we got for Shanes World #32, Texxx decided to move out to L.A. and become a pornstar. Calli brought him to his first orgy and hooked him up with some hot pussy to make him feel welcome. He returned the favor by dropping a big load on Calli and Ashley's faces. Then we threw a big party at a Hollywood nightclub and things started to get steamy there, too. Good thing we had our camera! Later, a cute young couple shows us what drunk sex is like. One thing we've learned is that when the shit hits the fan, you've gotta be Down for Whatever!
title: Shane's World 33: Down For Whatever
